1.title: Chapter One

episode of.title: The Sky-High City of Steampuff (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: When young Victor Von Toot's inventor father is seized by a swarm of steampunk squid, it is up to Victor to use his father's inventions to get him back.

2.title: Chapter Two

episode of.title: The Sky-High City of Steampuff (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Losing track of his father but discovering Samson's secret, Victor heads home to engage his father's emergency plan. The result of that plan comes as quite a surprise.

3.title: Chapter Three

episode of.title: The Sky-High City of Steampuff (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Venturing out to rescue Haephestus, Victor and the Duchess are thwarted by a horde of mechanical villainy.

4.title: Chapter Four

episode of.title: The Sky-High City of Steampuff (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Crashing down into the cityscape, Victor and the Duchess race Samson through the inner workings of the City of Steampuff.

5.title: Chapter Five

episode of.title: The Sky-High City of Steampuff (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Hope for long-awaited rescue takes a turn when the Duchess' mysterious origin is revealed.

episode of.title: The Sky-High City of Steampuff (TV Series 2012– )

7.title: Chapter Seven

episode of.title: The Sky-High City of Steampuff (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: The battle for Steampuff reaches its riveting conclusion as a new threat emerges.

imdb.plot outline: The Sky-High City of Steampuff is a floating island hidden among the clouds. When Steampuff's architect Haephestus Von Toot (who has been charged with keeping the world of Steampuff aloft) is suddenly kidnapped by the robotic Killamari, it's up to his only son Victor to rescue him. Fortunately, his father left behind a treasure-trove of steam-powered gizmos and companions to aid Victor on this dangerous quest. With the help of Duchess the sassy automaton housemaid, Rivet the croaking robot frog and Samson the transforming locomotive, Victor must find his father and prevent the city from falling from the sky. Along the journey, he will discover something even more treacherous: the truth about his own family.
imdb.title: The Sky-High City of Steampuff
akas: The Sky-High City of Steampuff (United States)
plot: _The Sky-High City of Steampuff_ (qv) is a floating island hidden among the clouds. When Steampuff's architect Haephestus Von Toot (who has been charged with keeping the world of Steampuff aloft) is suddenly kidnapped by the robotic Killamari, it's up to his only son Victor to rescue him. Fortunately, his father left behind a treasure-trove of steam-powered gizmos and companions to aid Victor on this dangerous quest. With the help of Duchess the sassy automaton housemaid, Rivet the croaking robot frog and Samson the transforming locomotive, Victor must find his father and prevent the city from falling from the sky. Along the journey, he will discover something even more treacherous: the truth about his own family.
